verses.kjv: Peter, an apostle of Jesus Christ, to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia, and Bithynia,
verses.ct: Peter, an apostle of Jesus Christ, writing to God's people living as foreigners scattered across Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia, and Bithynia,

verses.kjv: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, through sanctification of the Spirit, unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ: Grace unto you, and peace, be multiplied.
verses.ct: chosen according to the advance plan of God the Father, set apart by the Spirit for obedience and for the cleansing through the blood of Jesus Christ: May grace and peace be yours in greater and greater measure.

verses.kjv: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,
verses.ct: All praise to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ! In his great mercy, he has given us new birth into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,

verses.kjv: To an inheritance incorruptible, and undefiled, and that fadeth not away, reserved in heaven for you,
verses.ct: and into an inheritance that can never be destroyed, never be stained, and never fade away — kept safe in heaven for you.

verses.kjv: Who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time.
verses.ct: Through faith, you are guarded by God's power for a salvation that is ready to be unveiled in the final age.

verses.kjv: Wherein ye greatly rejoice, though now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations:
verses.ct: This gives you tremendous joy, even though right now, for a short while, you may have to endure grief through all kinds of trials.

verses.kjv: That the trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth, though it be tried with fire, might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ:
verses.ct: These trials test your faith, which is far more valuable than gold — and gold is perishable even after being refined by fire. The purpose is that your faith will result in praise, honor, and glory when Jesus Christ appears.

verses.kjv: Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory:
verses.ct: You love him even though you have never seen him. And even though you don't see him now, you trust in him and are filled with an inexpressible, glorious joy,

verses.kjv: Receiving the end of your faith, even the salvation of your souls.
verses.ct: because you are obtaining the goal of your faith: the salvation of your souls.

verses.kjv: Of which salvation the prophets have enquired and searched diligently, who prophesied of the grace that should come unto you:
verses.ct: The prophets carefully investigated and explored this salvation — the same prophets who spoke about the grace that was meant for you.

verses.kjv: Searching what, or what manner of time the Spirit of Christ which was in them did signify, when it testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ, and the glory that should follow.
verses.ct: They tried to determine the time and circumstances that the Spirit of Christ within them was pointing to, when it predicted in advance the sufferings of Christ and the glory that would come after.

verses.kjv: Unto whom it was revealed, that not unto themselves, but unto us they did minister the things, which are now reported unto you by them that have preached the gospel unto you with the Holy Ghost sent down from heaven; which things the angels desire to look into.
verses.ct: It was shown to them that they were not serving themselves but you, when they spoke about the things that have now been announced to you by those who shared the good news with you through the Holy Spirit sent from heaven — things that even angels long to understand.

verses.kjv: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind, be sober, and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ;
verses.ct: So prepare your minds for action. Stay alert, and place your complete hope in the grace that will be given to you when Jesus Christ is revealed.

verses.kjv: As obedient children, not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance:
verses.ct: As obedient children, don't let yourselves be shaped by the desires you used to follow when you didn't know any better.

verses.kjv: But as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation;
verses.ct: Instead, just as the one who called you is holy, be holy in every aspect of your lives.

verses.kjv: Because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.
verses.ct: For Scripture says, 'Be holy, because I am holy.'

verses.kjv: And if ye call on the Father, who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man’s work, pass the time of your sojourning here in fear:
verses.ct: Since you call on a Father who judges each person's actions impartially, live out your time here as foreigners with deep reverence,

verses.kjv: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold, from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers;
verses.ct: knowing that you were not rescued from the empty way of life handed down to you by your ancestors with perishable things like silver or gold.

verses.kjv: But with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot:
verses.ct: Instead, you were rescued with the precious blood of Christ, like that of a lamb with no defect or flaw.

verses.kjv: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world, but was manifest in these last times for you,
verses.ct: He was chosen before the creation of the world, but was revealed in these final days for your sake.

verses.kjv: Who by him do believe in God, that raised him up from the dead, and gave him glory; that your faith and hope might be in God.
verses.ct: Through him you place your trust in God, who raised him from the dead and gave him glory, so that your faith and hope rest in God.

verses.kjv: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren, see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently:
verses.ct: Now that you have made your souls pure by following the truth through the Spirit, resulting in genuine love for your brothers and sisters, love each other deeply from a sincere heart.

verses.kjv: Being born again, not of corruptible seed, but of incorruptible, by the word of God, which liveth and abideth for ever.
verses.ct: You have been born again — not from a seed that decays, but from one that is imperishable — through the living and enduring word of God.

verses.kjv: For all flesh is as grass, and all the glory of man as the flower of grass. The grass withereth, and the flower thereof falleth away:
verses.ct: For all human life is like grass, and all its glory is like a wildflower. The grass dries up and the flower drops away,

verses.kjv: But the word of the Lord endureth for ever. And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you.
verses.ct: but the word of the Lord stands forever. And this is the word that was proclaimed to you through the good news.
